ggplot2 themes and color scales following the visual identity of the
Annenberg Institute at Brown University.

![Default ggplot2 scatter
plot](reference/figures/compare-default.png)![Same plot styled with
ggaib](reference/figures/compare-ggaib.png)

Drag to compare: default ggplot2 (left) vs. ggaib (right)

## Features

- **[Themes](https://andrewmcamp.github.io/ggaib/articles/themes.md)** —
  Publication, data-dense, and map variants
- **[Color
  Scales](https://andrewmcamp.github.io/ggaib/articles/color-scales.md)**
  — Discrete, continuous, and diverging palettes
- **[Labels](https://andrewmcamp.github.io/ggaib/articles/labels.md)** —
  Dollar, comma, and percent axis formatters
- **[Palettes](https://andrewmcamp.github.io/ggaib/articles/palettes.md)**
  — Direct access to brand colors
- **[Font
  System](https://andrewmcamp.github.io/ggaib/articles/fonts.md)** —
  Automatic font registration with bundled fallbacks

## Installation

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("andrewmcamp/ggaib")
```

## Get started

Read the [introduction
vignette](https://andrewmcamp.github.io/ggaib/articles/introduction.md)
for a guided tour, or browse the [function
reference](https://andrewmcamp.github.io/ggaib/reference/index.md).

# Package index

## Themes

ggplot2 themes for different contexts

- [`theme_aib()`](https://andrewmcamp.github.io/ggaib/reference/theme_aib.md)
  : Annenberg Institute Base Theme
- [`theme_aib_grid()`](https://andrewmcamp.github.io/ggaib/reference/theme_aib_grid.md)
  : Annenberg Institute Grid Theme
- [`theme_aib_map()`](https://andrewmcamp.github.io/ggaib/reference/theme_aib_map.md)
  : Annenberg Institute Map Theme

## Color Scales

Discrete, continuous, diverging, and binned scales using AIB brand
colors

- [`scale_color_aib()`](https://andrewmcamp.github.io/ggaib/reference/scale_color_aib.md)
  [`scale_colour_aib()`](https://andrewmcamp.github.io/ggaib/reference/scale_color_aib.md)
  : Discrete AIB Color Scale
- [`scale_fill_aib()`](https://andrewmcamp.github.io/ggaib/reference/scale_fill_aib.md)
  : Discrete AIB Fill Scale
- [`scale_color_aib_c()`](https://andrewmcamp.github.io/ggaib/reference/scale_color_aib_c.md)
  [`scale_colour_aib_c()`](https://andrewmcamp.github.io/ggaib/reference/scale_color_aib_c.md)
  : Continuous AIB Color Scale
- [`scale_fill_aib_c()`](https://andrewmcamp.github.io/ggaib/reference/scale_fill_aib_c.md)
  : Continuous AIB Fill Scale
- [`scale_color_aib_div()`](https://andrewmcamp.github.io/ggaib/reference/scale_color_aib_div.md)
  [`scale_colour_aib_div()`](https://andrewmcamp.github.io/ggaib/reference/scale_color_aib_div.md)
  : Diverging AIB Color Scale
- [`scale_fill_aib_div()`](https://andrewmcamp.github.io/ggaib/reference/scale_fill_aib_div.md)
  : Diverging AIB Fill Scale
- [`scale_color_aib_b()`](https://andrewmcamp.github.io/ggaib/reference/scale_color_aib_b.md)
  [`scale_colour_aib_b()`](https://andrewmcamp.github.io/ggaib/reference/scale_color_aib_b.md)
  : Binned AIB Color Scale
- [`scale_fill_aib_b()`](https://andrewmcamp.github.io/ggaib/reference/scale_fill_aib_b.md)
  : Binned AIB Fill Scale

## Labels

Axis label formatters and annotation helpers

- [`aib_label()`](https://andrewmcamp.github.io/ggaib/reference/aib_label.md)
  : Axis Label Formatters
- [`aib_color_title()`](https://andrewmcamp.github.io/ggaib/reference/aib_color_title.md)
  : Colored Title or Subtitle
- [`aib_direct_label()`](https://andrewmcamp.github.io/ggaib/reference/aib_direct_label.md)
  : Direct Labels on a Secondary Y-Axis

## Palette

Access brand colors directly

- [`aib_colors()`](https://andrewmcamp.github.io/ggaib/reference/aib_colors.md)
  : Annenberg Institute Brand Colors
- [`aib_pal()`](https://andrewmcamp.github.io/ggaib/reference/aib_pal.md)
  : Annenberg Institute Color Palette Function

## Fonts

Font family management

- [`aib_font()`](https://andrewmcamp.github.io/ggaib/reference/aib_font.md)
  : AIB Font Family Names
- [`aib_font_families()`](https://andrewmcamp.github.io/ggaib/reference/aib_font_families.md)
  : All AIB Font Families
